policies.name: CVE-2020-25638: hibernate-core: SQL injection vulnerability
policies.description: A flaw was found in hibernate-core in versions prior to and including 5.4.23.Final. A SQL injection in the implementation of the JPA Criteria API can permit unsanitized literals when a literal is used in the SQL comments of the query. This flaw could allow an attacker to access unauthorized information or possibly conduct further attacks. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity.
policies.remediation: Your software is vulnerable for a SQL injection attack. Update your software. Read more here: https://access.redhat.com/security/cve/CVE-2020-25638
